description: There is talk that Russia captured Dementiivka (1)
column4: but the geolocated videos I have seen are more or less in territory I knew Russia already controlled. Nevertheless
column5: I have changed the town to gray area.

description: There are rumors that Ukraine launched a counter attack into Bohorodychne (2) but I am seeking confirmation before updating the map.
Russians claim total control over Hryhorivka
column4: but I see evidence that their attempts to enter the town are getting repelled (3).

description: The lesser of the Russian sources claim they control Verkhnokamyanske
column4: but even the better Russian sources claim there is still major fighting (4). Ukrainians claim the attack is repelled
column5: and I believe the town is a gray area.

description: I do see evidence of Russian advance near Spirne
column4: where I once believed the town might still be contested
column5: I am seeing more evidence of fighting taking place between Spirne and Ivano-Darivka (5).

description: The Russian attack into Berestove appeared to have ended in dismal failure today (6). The stories I have heard about their situation were incredibly dire
column4: but I have talked around and it may be that the stories were fabricated so I will hold off talking about it unless confirmed.

description: Russia also tried to attack Bilohorivka (7) and Yakolivka (8) but were repelled with heavy losses. One thing I feel confident saying
column4: though
column5: is that Ukrainian artillery in this area has been relentless

description: Russia also tried to attack Bilohorivka (7) and Yakolivka (8) but were repelled with heavy losses. One thing I feel confident saying
column4: though
column5: is that Ukrainian artillery in this area has been relentless

description: South of Bakhmut the Russians tried to take control over Novoluhanske
column4: but their overly aggressive attack led to failure (9). Russia probably also tried to attack Vershyna and the Vuhlehirska power plant
column5: but I didn't read any news about it.

column4: there is heavy fighting in Marinka (10) where Russians are trying very hard to take the town for some reason. Last night they drenched Marinka with incendiary rounds. I've been asked what that means: the shells drop really hot stuff that lights things on fire.
but from the artillery hits and the previous days attacks towards Vodyane make me believe this attack is from from the south east on this weird angle (11).

description: Russians tried to attack Pavlivka from Yehorivka (12) but were repelled.
